enhanced_by.reason: The toString method relies on the state of shortOpts and longOpts, which are populated by the addOption method.
The toString method relies on the state of optionGroups, which is populated by the addOptionGroup method.
Both toString and helpOptions methods return a string representation of the options, making assertions on the output of helpOptions useful for validating toString.
The getOptions method returns a collection of options that can be used to validate the content of the string returned by toString.
